title: AI-Driven Digital English Textbook Design and Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Pre-service teacher training program for elementary English teachers, focusing on core functionalities of AI-based digital textbooks and personalized learning design strategies

learning_goals: Learners can explain strategies for utilizing diagnostic and assessment features of AI-based digital English textbooks.
Learners can apply a learner-level-tailored instructional design process.
Learners understand the operational principles of adaptive learning support systems and can modify them for real educational contexts.
Learners can simulate the process of analyzing digital dashboard data and applying insights to instructional improvement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
